mapper.insert: insert into abook(userID, applyISBN, applySubject,applyCompany, applyPublicationDate,applyDate, applyWriter,applyPrice,applyWhy) values(#{userID},#{applyISBN},#{applySubject},#{applyCompany}, #{applyPublicationDate},now(), #{applyWriter},#{applyPrice},#{applyWhy})
mapper.select: select applyNo, applyISBN, applySubject, applyCompany, applyPublicationDate, applyDate, applyWriter,applyPrice,applyWhy,applyType from abook where userID = #{userID}
